page.title: 11The Vineyard
page.content: The vineyard at{Fonthill Gifford}was first thought about in{1977}and was planted out in 1979. The soil is {greensand}with{limestone}beneath. The{United Kingdom}markets are {Tisbury, Salisbury, Cambridge, Saffron {Waldron}and{London.}The wine is exported to{Canada, Hong Kong, {America, Australia}and{New Zealand. At present only white wine is produced in seventy centilitre bottles, but it is hoped to produce red wine in the near future. The vineyard is situated on the farm owned by Mr. J. Edgington.
